scripts.postinstall: cd client && pnpm install --frozen-lockfile && cd ../server && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.build: pnpm run build:frontend && pnpm run build:backend
scripts.build:backend: cd client && pnpm run build && cd ../server && pyinstaller --noconfirm --onedir --console --icon './src/assets/logo.svg' --add-data './web:web/' '../dist/' --workpath '../dist/core' --hidden-import 'timeit' --hidden-import 'bisect' --name companion './main.py'
scripts.start: concurrently "cd client && pnpm run dev" "cd server && python3 main.py"
